TextView.android:text:
Requirements: 
 	 1.Enable GPS service 
 	 2.Enable your Internet service 
 Background Service: 
 Location Service start on power on of your mobile device 
 to force stop, use preference screen. 
 
 Service tracks current location in background 
 and checks if any task is found in and around the current location
Working With Menu: 
 	 1.Press Menu when in first screen to >Add Task> 
 	 2.Navigate to About option to know information about this app 
 	 3.Help option describes in detail the working procedure 
 	 4.Preference screen will help change the settings 
 Task List in main activity: 
 	 1.All task will be shown as list view in first screen 
 	 2.Click on corresponding task to edit 
 Button: 
 	 Quick task screen will show confirm button on pressing will add task to main list 
 	 Map button will navigates to map view on screen 
 	 Drag and select location of interest and press back button to continue with task edit Preferences: 
 	 1.Enable or disable GPS through this shortcut 
 	 2.Stop/Stop Location service 
 (GPS consumes battery power it is advisable to stop service when not in use, 
however you will be able to add,edit task even when service is stopped) 
 
	 3.Configure location to be informed around you in Kilometer(Km) 
 	 4.If you need start up instruction to get disabled click on option disable 
 	 5. Sort the main task list based on priority
